meanings.definition: To press or squeeze with force
meanings.sent1: She crushes the grapes to make juice.
meanings.sent2: He crushes the can to recycle it.
meanings.sent3: The strong man crushes the soda can effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The hydraulic press crushes the metal into a flat sheet.
meanings.sent5: The weightlifter crushes the barbell with ease.

meanings.definition: A brief but intense infatuation for someone
meanings.sent1: Her crushes on celebrities are always changing.
meanings.sent2: Having crushes in high school is common.
meanings.sent3: His crushes on fictional characters make his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The idea of love at first sight feels like a crushes in the heart.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of crushes can be exciting yet nerve-wracking.

meanings.sent1: The wave crushes the sandcastle on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The army crushes the enemy's defenses in battle.
meanings.sent3: The final exam crushes his hopes for a perfect score.
meanings.sent4: The news of the loss crushes their spirits.
meanings.sent5: The defeat crushes his dreams of becoming a champion.
